channel.title: FAAS on Nothing in Particular
channel.description: Recent content in FAAS on Nothing in Particular

item.title: ESK8BST - Electric Skateboard Buy / Sell / Trade
item.description: I wanted a better way to find people posting electric skateboards for sale, and I thought it would be nice to use the opportunity to learn some new technologies. The primary knowledge I came away with is that Serverless is pretty neat, and that Email is a god damned nightmare.
